ur_rna.Utilities.prefs

Class FilePreferences.Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.Utilities.prefs.FilePreferences.Factory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.prefs.PreferencesFactory
    Enclosing class:
    FilePreferences

    public static class FilePreferences.Factory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.prefs.PreferencesFactory
    PreferencesFactory implementation that stores the preferences in an XML file. (N.B. The system property java.util.prefs.PreferencesFactory must be set to ur_rna.Utilities.prefs.FilePreferences.Factory

    The file defaults to [user.home]/[ProgramTitle].prefs, but may be overridden with the system property ur_rna.Utilities.prefs.FilePreferences.Factory

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferencesFile

        public static java.io.File getPreferencesFile()

      • register

        public static void register()
        Sets the system property java.util.prefs.PreferencesFactory to the FilePreferences.Factory class so that the Preferences class will use it for the global singleton PreferencesFactory. This affects calls such as Preferences.userRoot() and Preferences.userNodeForPackage(Class) etc.

      • register

        public static void register(java.io.File preferencesFile)

      • setPreferencesFile
